lines: 1. Ndi wenu Mfumu. naumfwe shiwi. lyanjeba kumutemwa;
Lelo ndefwaya kupalamina. Pepi pepi mwe Mfumu.
2. Kanjipe cipya kumubombela, Mpelwe maka cikuku;
Mpunamine ko mubusumino, Ndoshe â€˜mo mufwaila.
Na ine nsoshanye nemwe Lesa, Fyo nsosa ne cibusa.
4. Kwabako kutemwa nshingeshiba, Kanwe Iyo nkaye shilya;
Kwabakwe nseko nshingakumamo, kano ntushe muli 'Mwe.
